description.value:
Your lilting words take to the wind, calming the wrath of nature for a short while.

Alternative Reward: Fey Magic Gift - Uncommon

Power - Daily (Standard Action)

Effect: You create a zone in a close burst 20 that lasts for 6 hours. The severity of weather in the zone is drastically reduced. A blizzard becomes a gentle snowfall, torrential rain becomes a light mist, and a howling gale is reduced to a gentle breeze. Creatures in the zone gain a +5 power bonus to Endurance checks caused by weather, and weather cannot heavily obscure the zone; it can only lightly obscure it.
